column2: Right Mindfulness;Mindfulness of body;Mindfulness of feeling;Mindfulness of mind

Ajahn Pasanno, Ajahn Karuṇadhammo, and Ajahn Ñāṇiko take turns reading suttas and teachings regarding the Four Foundations of Mindfulness. The structure often follows  _Right Mindfulness_ by Ajahn Ṭhānissaro. There are noteworth [slideshows](#WR2015_S07) illustrating the 32 parts of the body.
